title: [PATCH] Auto-deploy script for polly bot fixed
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.summary: Updates the auto-deployment workflow for the Polly bot with better logging and directory configuration.
gist.impact: Ensures more reliable and transparent background updates for the community bot.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mechanic tweaking a friendly robot's gears. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mechanic tweaking a friendly robot's gears. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
